List Plots

type Changes t a = [(t, a)] Source #

A Plot implemented as a list. It is not an instance of anything interesting

before :: Ord t => t -> Changes t a -> Changes t a Source #

Take all elements of the Plot which occur before tx

delay :: Num t => t -> Changes t a -> Changes t a Source #

Shift time, but leave data untouched

start :: Changes t a -> t Source #

Get the start time of the first element. Fails when Plot is empty

cJoin :: forall t a. (Ord t, Num t) => Changes t (Changes t a) -> Changes t a Source #

Explicit monadic join

list :: Show a => a -> IO () Source #

foo :: a -> a Source #

exa :: Changes Int String Source #

exb :: Changes Int String Source #

exc :: Changes Int (Changes Int String) Source #
